column2: This character has recently undergone succession.
I can upgrade the [Root.GetFullName] to a proper castle settlement.
I can upgrade the [Root.GetFullName] to a proper city settlement.
I can upgrade the [Root.GetFullName] to a proper temple settlement.
As your guest at court, §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! can be sent away if [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] is not a prisoner, a child, or working for you in an official capacity.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Holy Roman Empire.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Saint-Empire Romain.
Eliminate all ahistorical de jure empires from this campaign. The HRE, the Byzantine Empire, and the Persian Empire will remain.

column6: Invita a un soldado a la corte

column2: Invite a promising soldier to court, to aid with military matters.
column6: Invita a un soldado prometedor a tu corte para ayudar en cuestiones militares.
Invita a un espía a la corte

column2: Invite a promising spy to court, to aid with matters of intrigue.
column6: Invita a un espía prometedor a la corte para ayudar con asuntos de intriga
Invita a un diplomático a la corte

column2: Invite a promising diplomat to court, to aid with diplomatic matters.
column6: Invita a un diplomático prometedor a la corte para ayudar en cuestiones diplomáticas.

column2: Your liege has a direct vassal which is actually your de jure vassal. You may petition [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] for a vassal transfer.
Do not bring such petitions before me ever again!

Enforcing Realm Peace will end all internal wars between your direct vassals. The peace will take effect 6 months after it has been decreed. Use this ability to keep your vassals from growing too strong within your realm.
column3: Décréter la paix du royaume mettra un terme aux conflits internes entre vos vassaux directs. La paix prendra effet 6 mois après qu'elle soit édictée. Utilisez cette compétence pour empêcher vos vassaux de devenir trop puissants au sein de votre royaume.
column4: Bei der Durchsetzung des Reichsfriedens werden alle reichsinternen Kriege zwischen Euren direkten Vasallen beendet. Der Frieden tritt 6 Monate nach dem Beschluss in Kraft. Ihr könnt mit dieser Maßnahme verhindern, dass einzelne Vasallen zu stark werden.
column6: Hacer cumplir la Paz del Reino terminará todas las guerras internas entre tus vasallos directos. La paz entrará en efecto seis meses después de haber sido decretada. Usa esta habilidad para impedir que tus vasallos crezcan demasiado dentro de tu reino.

column2: Controls all de jure counties of the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!\n
A direct vassal of my liege, §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, is my rightful de jure vassal. All of us are at peace.\n
Is NOT Guardian of a child.\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court and forced to take up residence somewhere else in your realm. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court. Because there are no other eligible courts, [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] will leave your realm and will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be banished from your court and, because [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] is of a different faith, will leave your realm for one of [Root.GetObjectPronoun] own religion. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] will be very unlikely to accept return invitations.\n\n
